timeline.bodyText: Best practice would be to type this as List, rather than ArrayList, we shouldn't care about the class of the object behind it.
timeline.author: famous1622

replies.bodyText: Wait does Forge type this as ArrayList? If so :concern:
replies.author: famous1622

replies.bodyText: IIRC it was a custom implementation of ArrayList to track if the ArrayList had been modified
replies.author: Rongmario

replies.bodyText: BOP calls setupBiomes directly through reflection. It casts the result to a List, but since the actual Forge type extends ArrayList, I thought this would be better.
replies.author: leo60228

replies.bodyText: Why not go all the way and implement the class from Forge in case someone casts to it?
replies.author: famous1622

replies.bodyText: True, that just didn't seem necessary. I'll do that later.
replies.author: leo60228

timeline.author: famous1622

timeline.bodyText: Could this just be implemented as an Accessor?
timeline.author: famous1622
